text:
#Raipur, Mar 14 (PTI) The #Chhattisgarh #government is considering #allowing the use of #Covaxin, a #vaccine against #COVID19, in the #state after the #Centre dropped its ‘#clinicaltrialmode’ tag, #state #Health #Minister #TSSinghDeo said on #Sunday.
